comments: Well, this is irrelevant since Professor Vaidya is leaving and I think he really defined the course.
This class changed the way I think about myself in the world. It is relevant to science and social science concentrators and was the best seminar I have been in at Harvard.

Excellent topics of discussion and great discussion moderation by Professor Vaidya helped make class really interesting and engaging. It is too bad that he will not be teaching the class in the near future :(
Again, the material was fascinating, the discussions were great, and professor Vaidya was the bomb.
